Note:

Central Bank of UAE Verification

Notice: Your verification is currently in process in accordance with the Central Bank of UAE. Your personal and financial information is securely cross-checked with records held by the Central Bank. Advanced security protocols are in place during the verification to protect your data.

All financial institutions listed here comply with UAE regulations and are under the supervision of the Central Bank of UAE.
